docs.snippet: The United States will face off on Monday against Ghana, in a matchup that over the last decade has turned into an unexpected rivalry. Victory for the Americans would be a long time coming.

docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times; United States national soccer team is preparing for their first-round World Cup match against Ghana, who has knocked them out of the last two World Cup competitions.
